name: Chute
long_description:
hute powers enterprise UGC for brands, agencies and publishers – from discovering consumer photos and videos, both with visual and text search, to the ideation, production, and amplification of compelling visual material.

Chute works with some of the world’s biggest brands and publishers including Benefit Cosmetics, NBCUniversal, adidas, Brown-Forman, Condé Nast, NBA, United Nations, New York Times, and Ford. For more information, visit www.getchute.com.

You can reach us anytime at hello@getchute.com. We look forward to hearing from you!

name: Amplitude
long_description:
Since graduating from YC, Amplitude (W12) has made it to IPO and beyond by helping cutting edge startups become category leaders. We’ve pioneered the digital analytics category to become the go-to solution for AI pioneers (Cruise, Midjourney), apps that touch millions of consumers (Doordash, Coinbase), and the best in B2B (Atlassian, Rippling, Canva).  

With product analytics, experiment, CDP, session replay, and more, Amplitude’s digital analytics platform shows you what your users love, where they’re getting stuck, and what keeps them coming back. You want to build a generational business, and we have the capabilities and pricing plans to guide you every step of the way. Check out our special deal for YC companies and get started on your analytics journey.
one_liner: Digital Analytics Platform

name: OneSignal
long_description:
OneSignal is the leading omnichannel customer engagement solution, powering personalized customer journeys across mobile and web push notifications, in-app messaging, SMS, and email. Our easy-to-use interface empowers content creators to focus on quality user engagement instead of complex implementation.

Our powerful platform enables over a million businesses to deliver 10 billion messages daily and 1 in 7 new apps launches using OneSignal! We support companies in 140 countries, including Zynga, USA Today, Bitcoin.com, Upwork, Tribune, and many more - from startups and small businesses just getting off the ground to established companies communicating with millions of customers.
one_liner: Engage customers through personalized omni-channel messaging

name: LeadGenius
long_description:
LeadGenius is the most efficient way to equip sales and marketing teams with custom B2B lead data at scale. Our data experts conduct ongoing research to automatically supply teams with accurate contact information and hard-to-acquire data points for your most valuable buyer personas.

By combining a remote global workforce, custom data, and machine learning, LeadGenius delivers the highest lead generation value in the marketplace.
one_liner: LeadGenius is an account-based marketing and lead generation…

name: Userfox
long_description: userfox is a SaaS product that helps companies improve user retention through welcome, inactivity and custom trigger based emails. We're building a company. Not a product, and certainly not a feature. We believe that making this clear matters. It sets expectations to ourselves and to our customers. We're based in sunny San Francisco, California.
one_liner: User retention as a service.  Drip email

name: DemandSphere
long_description: DemandSphere enables ecommerce and programmatic SEO teams, both in-house and agency, to drive more traffic from organic search. Our DemandMetrics platform is our core monitoring platform that turns massive amounts of SERP and market data into prioritized insights for growth. Our SERP Intelligence data warehouse accelerates our customer's ability to detect and respond to changes in the search landscape.
one_liner: SEO & Content Marketing Intelligence

name: 500Friends
long_description:
Merkle Loyalty Solutions, formerly 500friends,  is a leader in customer loyalty marketing solutions. Clients depend on us to help them develop and execute a differentiated and impactful customer loyalty strategy that delivers the business results they expect. Merkle Loyalty Solutions is recognized by Forrester Research as a Strong Performer in The Forrester Wave™: Customer Loyalty Solutions, Q3 2017, and as a Leader and received the highest overall score in The Forrester Wave™: Customer Loyalty Solutions For Midsize Organizations, Q1 2016.

The end-to-end loyalty services Merkle Loyalty Solutions offer include: 
- Strategic consulting 
- SaaS loyalty platform named LoyaltyPlus™
- Platform integration
- Program management and support 
- Advanced analytics 

Merkle is a leading data-driven, technology-enabled, global performance marketing agency that specializes in the delivery of unique, personalized customer experiences across platforms and devices. The agency’s heritage in data, technology, and analytics forms the foundation for its unmatched skills in understanding consumer insights that drive people-based marketing strategies. With more than 4,100 employees, the Merkle team is based in Columbia, MD, with 16 additional offices in the US and 8 offices in Europe and Asia. In 2016, the agency joined the Dentsu Aegis Network. Learn more about Merkle Loyalty Solutions at www.500friends.com.

---

We're hiring! Please check out our openings at: www.500friends.com/who-we-are/careers
one_liner: the best loyalty and retention marketing partner for CMOs.

name: Optimizely
long_description:
At Optimizely, we're on a mission to help people unlock their digital potential. We do that by reinventing how marketing and product teams work to create and optimize digital experiences across all channels. With Optimizely One, our industry-first operating system for marketers, we offer teams flexibility and choice to build their stack their way with our fully SaaS, fully decoupled, and highly composable solution. We help companies around the world orchestrate their entire content lifecycle, monetize every digital experience and experiment across all customer touchpoints – all through Optimizely One, the leading digital experience platform that powers every phase of the marketing lifecycle through a single, AI-accelerated workflow. 

Optimizely has nearly 1500 employees across our 21 global offices and has 700+ partners. We are proud to help more than 10,000 businesses, including H&M, PayPal, Zoom, and Toyota, enrich their customer lifetime value, increase revenue and grow their brands. At Optimizely, we live each day with a simple philosophy: large enough to serve, small enough to care. Learn more at optimizely.com.
one_liner: The first all-in-one operating system for marketing

name: OwnLocal
long_description: OwnLocal works with more than 3,300+ local media companies to transform their legacy customers base into sophisticated local digital advertisers. Our technology has been designed to work seamlessly with your current sales processes and makes it simple for any newspaper, radio station, or broadcast television station to help your local customers win online.
one_liner: OwnLocal automates marketing for over 129,000 SMBs through 3,300…

long_description: ContestMachine is a web service that makes running promotions from any website easy. The service allows clients to run a contest or giveaway from their blog or website and handles the rest of the details, like collecting submissions and contacting winners. The service also allows clients varied options, like choosing entry requirements, start and end times, and the addition of prizes.
one_liner: Roll your own contest or giveaway.  No longer in business.

name: Canopy Labs
long_description:
Every customer reaches a buying decision in their unique way – Canopy Labs helps businesses to track and optimize their customer journey.

Using our platform, businesses can plan more targeted marketing campaigns and optimize their lead lists, with a focus on maximizing revenue and sales growth. Our platform is currently being used in a variety of industries, including sports, ticket sales, daily deals, and online retail, and customers ranging from $10B retailers to small online businesses.

Canopy Labs has offices in Toronto and New York City. The company is led by CEO Wojciech Gryc, who is a former McKinsey consultant and Rhodes Scholar, and CTO Jorge Escobedo, who has a PhD in Theoretical Physics and researched string theory. It is backed by Y Combinator, BDC IT Ventures Fund, and Valar Ventures.
one_liner: Canopy Labs automates customer analytics for small and medium-sized…

name: Partnered
long_description: Partnered is the exclusive digital network connecting leading brands and emerging tech companies. Visit Partnered.com to request access.

LocalOn provides customer relationship management tools to small businesses.

name: Webflow
long_description:
Webflow is the leading no-code visual web development platform. It seamlessly generates sophisticated code so anyone can build powerful web-based businesses and adapt to changes without developers or months of building. 

From entrepreneurs and creative agencies to Fortune 500 companies, Webflow makes the internet a more inclusive place by making the tools to build on it more accessible to more people, fueling business growth. Webflow powers websites for innovators like Discord, Monday.com, IDEO, Orange Theory Fitness, TED, and Dropbox. 

Webflow is backed by Y Combinator, Accel, CapitalG, Silversmith, and other awesome investors.
one_liner: Professional website design and publishing platform.

name: Hublo
long_description: Hublo (www.hublo.com) is making data-driven marketing simpler. It's a super simple tool, allowing marketers to set-up analytics, monitor precisely what's happening on their website and launch remarketing campaigns without relying on their IT teams.
one_liner: Hublo is making data-driven marketing simpler. It's a super simple…

name: Naytev
long_description:
Y-Combinator (S14)

A/B test your videos, articles, and images on Facebook, and automatically publish the best version everywhere. Get started at www.naytev.com.

Testing is every top social team's secret weapon.
It's no secret that standing out in the News Feed has become more difficult. That's why elite content teams test how the content they post to Facebook will appear.

We help the top brands and publishers in the world stand out in the noise and reach larger audiences. With Naytev's cutting-edge techniques, you can run expert-level tests in a matter of minutes.

Already an expert? We can help you scale your test volume and improve the quality of your tests.
one_liner: Naytev automates paid and organic social media management in one place

name: SalesSift
long_description:
SalesSift (formerly known as LeadFinch) is an intelligent lead-sourcing platform.

Our machine learning algorithm recommends the best new companies to target based upon the profile of your existing customers.
one_liner: Intelligent Lead Sourcing

name: Bizzy
long_description: Bizzy is an automated marketing platform designed to boost sales for ecommerce shops. Bizzy is the first tool to centralize a business’ entire marketing portfolio around a single, dynamic set of customer data. As this centralized data updates based on customer behavior and marketing interactions, Bizzy adapts and executes a business'​ campaigns.
one_liner: Bizzy is omni-channel marketing for ecommerce businesses.

name: Interstate Analytics
long_description:
Interstate Analytics helps marketers make smarter decisions. The customers of the company are Betabrand, Outdoor Voices, EVERLANE, and JACK ERWIN. It pulls in its users’ visit, conversion, and spends data across all channels and centralizes it in a dashboard. It allows its users to spend less time wrangling data and more time acting on it. It applies attribution models to its users’ data that take into account all consumer touchpoints and makes better spend allocation decisions with accurate performance data. The company deterministically syncs marketing spends and conversion data across devices.

Interstate Analytics was founded in 2015.
one_liner: Multi-Touch Marketing Analytics

name: Apollo.io
long_description:
Founded in 2015, Apollo.io is a lead intelligence and sales engagement platform trusted by nearly 9,000 paying customers, from rapidly growing startups to some of the largest global enterprises. Our community-based approach to crowdsourcing data gives users maximum coverage while ensuring data accuracy. Our advanced algorithms and unique data acquisition methods help over 500,000 sales professionals enrich and analyze prospects' data to increase quality conversations and opportunities.

We have notable investors: Y Combinator and Nexus Venture Partners. We recently completed a Series B financing to fuel our next growth phase. We have reached and maintained profitability for the last 18 months.

Our growth and customer feedback set us apart from competitors.  Apollo had over one million sign-ups for its platform in the past year, and the number of weekly active users increased by over 400%.  We are a top-ranking G2 Crowd vendor in the Sales Intelligence, Lead Intelligence, Marketing Account Intelligence, and Sales Engagement categories.  Our highest scores are in the B2B data space for accuracy and ROI based on customer reviews.
one_liner: Apollo is the foundation of your entire go-to-market strategy.

name: Cartcam
long_description: Cartcam is a shopping platform that gives people discounts for creating short video reviews. The company hopes to take advantage of the trend of consumers who are 85% more likely to purchase an item after watching a video. Cartcam incentivizes mobile creators to review items by offering them discounts on the items they want to buy. Already 12 percent of users place an order through the platform, and they are all creating content for Cartcam. The company makes money by partnering with brands who pay for the discounts in exchange for content that will sell more goods for them.
one_liner: Cartcam is an app for opinionated, deal-seeking shoppers.  It gives…

name: Inboxbooster
long_description:
We fix and monitor emails in spam. 

We monitor automatically where your emails is going, we alert you when it's going in spam and we fix it with you.

Best of all, the monitoring is free!
one_liner: We Fix Email in Spam

name: Slik

name: Avalanche

name: matagora
long_description: We’re on a mission to enable collaborative commerce for independent retailers to flourish. Matagora allows independent retailers to automate the manual work of retail collaborations to make their operations refreshingly simple. Discover new retail partners, onboard and import all product information in one click, sync with a retail partner's inventory in real-time, and never worry about a manual invoice or payment. Stores are instantly transformed into real-time scalable marketplaces while keeping their product curation exciting for their customers. Brands get access to infinitely more distribution channels, and ensure they always get paid on time. We simplify collaborative commerce from end-to-end so retailers can sell better, together.
one_liner: Instant physical presence for any online brand.

name: Heroic Story
long_description: We're building the world's first true Author OS - an intelligent engine that will transform how stories are created, shared, and loved. Our mission is to give storytellers superpowers, removing every barrier between imagination and reality through AI. Founded by brothers who've pushed creative boundaries across VR gaming, Twitch streaming, and Hollywood, we combine deep technical expertise with an innate understanding of what makes stories work. Our CEO, a former world-class poker player, brings the same strategic depth and calculated boldness that won millions to our mission of empowering creators. We're a team of rebellious optimists who believe we're standing at the threshold of storytelling's next great evolution. The printing press gave stories reach. We're giving them wings.
one_liner: AI-native Book Publishing

name: treble.ai
all_locations: São Paulo, SP, Brazil; New York, NY, USA; Seattle, WA, USA
long_description: We help companies build and scale marketing campaigns through WhatsApp, reaching their customers anywhere in the world with engaging conversations. With our platform, businesses can create and send conversations massively to users and get analytics to improve their campaign performance over time, increasing conversion in every stage of the funnel.

name: Resquared
long_description:
Local businesses were the hardest B2B segment to reach, but account for over 60% firms in the U.S.
Our SaaS application has data on every local business that are easy to get in touch with using our specialized marketing automation tools and workflows. 
Resquared has been proven to save sales pro's over 3 hours per day and result in 53% stronger leads (case study on website).

name: Venu AI
long_description: Build your community with Venu AI, the community building, B2B connections, and event marketing platform for enterprise.

name: Rethoric
long_description:
Most B2B founders know the value of building an audience on LinkedIn, but the process demands consistency, time, creativity, writing skills, and energy—things founders often lack.

Rethoric is a plug-and-play content team specializing in founder-led LinkedIn strategies for founders. 

Our approach positions founders as industry authorities in their niche, creating impactful content and engagement strategies that attract and engage their target customers.

By managing your LinkedIn presence with your authentic voice, we enable you to build an audience, establish credibility, generate leads, and create a scalable inbound marketing channel that drives consistent MQLs—on autopilot.
one_liner: Founder-led LinkedIn Content Consulting for B2B Founders

name: Navattic
long_description: Navattic helps sales and marketing teams instantly create interactive product demos.

name: Positional
all_locations: Charleston, SC, USA; Hoboken, NJ, USA

Our goal is to connect the workflow from end to end, from keyword research to analytics, and the actions that users take that ultimately drive revenue for a business.
one_liner: A modern platform for content marketing & SEO.

name: Replo
long_description: Replo helps companies sell on the internet. We do this by helping marketing teams automate building and testing customer journeys using data and AI.
one_liner: Replo helps companies sell more on the internet

name: Kaya
long_description:
Kaya is on a mission to help businesses achieve rapid growth through digital advertising. With our cutting-edge technology and experienced marketers, we deliver ad campaigns 10x cheaper, better and faster than traditional agencies. In less than a year, we’ve helped 120+ businesses achieve multiple fold growth on their ad campaigns, without the steep fees typically associated with high-quality marketing services.

Check out what some of our customers have to say here: usekaya.com/reviews
one_liner: Marketing agency for startups: 10x cheaper, better and faster

name: Plai
long_description: Plai is the AI advertising tool built for marketing teams and agencies. Thousands of advertisers are using Plai to create Facebook Ads, Google Ads, and TikTok Ads from a ChatGPT prompt. Plai automatically finds your target audience, generates your creative, and launches your ad campaigns like a pro in seconds, no experience required. Whether you need to acquire new leads for your startup, sales for your e-commerce store, or grow your brand, Plai is your super app for marketing.

name: Blaze
long_description: Blaze uses AI and automation to scan millions of online signals to help modern companies target the right potential customers as soon as they show interest.

name: Instant Labs
long_description: Instant Labs started in 2005 by building the fastest domain search engine on the internet: https://instantdomainsearch.com. People have performed over 2.5M searches and purchased 250K domains with our free tool. In 2023, we released Strobe, https://strobe.app, an AI-powered tool to help brands find creators to help them grow.
one_liner: Instant builds AI-powered tools to help build your business.

name: Rehook.ai
long_description:
rehook.ai is an all-in-one promotion engine. A complete stack which lets you run referral, loyalty, rewards, discounts, coupons, leaderboards, streaks, tiers etc and is flexible, trackable, scalable and secure.
 
With an intuitive rule engine, marketers can simply add/edit/change rules to generate coupons/rewards/cashbacks or any other incentives. rehook.ai lets you experiment and personalize campaigns around user segments, geographies, demographics, journeys and any other attribute- without ever going back to tech.
one_liner: Run, Track and manage any and all user incentive campaigns.

name: Zorba
all_locations: Saint Petersburg, FL, USA; Tel Aviv-Yafo, Tel Aviv District, Israel
long_description: Zorba is a real estate sales AI copilot, powered by proprietary vertical data, designed to help sales and customer success teams grow their client base and improve retention. It's used and trusted by both Fortune 500 and mid-market firms. With a multi-layered, LLM-driven engine, we’ve built a proprietary dataset of consolidated real estate entities, delivering real-time insights tailored specifically for the industry. Think Apollo or ZoomInfo, but AI-first and driven by real estate data
one_liner: AI copilot for real-estate sales teams, powered by proprietary data
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate

name: Super Send
long_description: Super Send is a powerful outreach automation platform designed to streamline and scale your prospecting efforts across multiple channels, including email, LinkedIn, and Twitter. With features like dynamic personalization, email warming, inbox rotation, and advanced analytics, Super Send enables businesses to connect with leads efficiently while maintaining a human touch. Whether you’re running A/B tests, managing campaigns, or optimizing deliverability, Super Send provides the tools you need to maximize engagement and grow your business
one_liner: Super Send automates personalized outreach across email, LinkedIn,…

name: Cotera
long_description: Cotera is an AI platform that helps companies understand what their customers are telling them. We integrate directly with the data warehouse, which allows us to derive actionable insights with the full context of all a company's data.
one_liner: AI for customer experience.

name: Vessel
long_description:
Vessel is the developer-first, native integration platform for GTM tools. We make it easy for developers to integrate with your customer’s CRMs, Sales Engagement, Marketing Automation, Chat, Dialers, and more. Integrate in different ways customized for your use cases: 

- Speed: Use our Unified APIs to roll out many integrations quickly through a common data model and unified interface.
- Depth: Use our actions API to build deeper integrations when working with entities custom to each app.
- Ease: Use ETL to let us handle pulling and pushing customer data to your DB
- Extensible: Support any integrations through our open-source integrations library

Breadth and depth, make your integrations limitless.
one_liner: Developer-first, native integration platform for GTM tools

name: Tuesday
long_description:
First, build hyper-targeted B2B contact lists without needing any manual verification – we’ll verify the leads for you. Then, generate 1000s of personalized emails that get you 8x more replies within minutes using AI.

**Reach more buyers with Triple-Verified contacts**
Other data providers in the market sell you outdated contacts that waste your time. Tuesday offers unlimited triple-verified emails and mobile phone numbers to you at extremely low cost.All contact data are triple-verified at the time of request, making sure you can reach your buyers easily.

**Book more meetings with AI-Personalized emails**
Stop wasting your precious time “personalizing” emails and LinkedIn messages. You didn’t sign up for this job to read the “About” section of everyone’s LinkedIn profile.Tuesday seamlessly integrates with LinkedIn profile data and uses cutting-edge AI models to generate personalized emails – in seconds.Send hyper-relevant 1:1 messages based on your prospects pain and your company’s offering, automatically.
one_liner: Scale personalized outreach with AI.

name: Avina
long_description:
Avina is an AI sales companion that alerts sales reps in real-time which accounts they should take action on, provides comprehensive briefs for every account before calls and wherever they work, and helps sellers draft the perfect communication - ensuring you don’t miss out on golden opportunities.


Avina is the only assistant with the full context of every account - it combines your marketing and sales touchpoints (including a new way to track exactly what a prospect has read on your site), call recordings, internal documentation, and external buying signals from across the web. Sellers no longer have to cobble together information buried in dozens of places.
one_liner: X-Ray Vision for Your Sales Team

name: Caddie AI
long_description: Caddie AI is building the future of website conversion. We're currently working in stealth with some incredible customers. Stay tuned!
one_liner: The future of website conversion

name: Gluetrail
long_description:
Gluetrail is a chrome extension that allows you to create support/training/marketing assets 10x faster, just from a screen and audio recording. These assets allow you to drive software or process adoption & awareness among prospects, customers or teammates.  

From one single recording, Gluetrail leverages your screen+clicks+audio transcript, and AI, to:
- automatically create step-by-step articles with screenshots and videos
- adapt the content for & publish it on 3rd party platforms in 1 click: internal or external knowledge bases (Notion, Confluence, Intercom, Zendesk...), community platforms and social media (linkedin, youtube, twitter, discourse...)
one_liner: Create step by step articles with screenshots and videos 10x faster

name: Booth AI
long_description: Booth AI enables companies to supercharge their creative output with a generative-AI powered image production platform. Booth AI replaces complicated, labor intensive, time consuming and expensive commercial product lifestyle photoshoots. Brand managers, merchandisers, and marketers can produce beautiful lifestyle images in a matter of seconds at a fraction of the cost of traditional photoshoots.
one_liner: Generative AI Photographer for E-Commerce

name: HockeyStack
long_description:
HockeyStack improves sales outcomes for B2B companies by helping them record and understand every interaction their customers have with their marketing, sales reps, CSMs, and products. 

We map every customer touchpoint from ad impression to closed won and to upsell using our own tracking script and native integrations to the B2B GTM tech stack. 

Building this source of truth allow us to give companies previously hidden insights that generate incremental revenue, such as:

- Deploy marketing budget: "Launch this ad campaign to this audience to generate $XM in pipeline"
- Target the right accounts with the right messaging: "These accounts have the highest likelihood to convert, put them on this email sequence"
- Convert more of the pipeline: “Pied Piper hasn't visited the site for 8 days; give Jim a phone call”
one_liner: The operating system for inbound B2B revenue

name: Kite
long_description: Kite helps software companies create Apple-style product videos. We turn a screen recording of your app into a stunning polished, professional video—no expensive agencies or complicated tools required. Video marketing is a massive, $104B industry, but the workflow for creating professional product videos hasn't changed in decades. Kite uses WebGL and AI to dramatically lower the cost of professional-grade video production.
one_liner: Apple-style product videos in minutes

name: Converge
long_description:
We're building the unified marketing measurement stack for online stores. We make it easy for marketeers to understand where their customers come from, cut unprofitable channels, and scale when things are working.

We are vertically integrating the modern data stack for marketing teams of online stores by consolidating customer data collection, consent management, identity resolution, transformations, attribution, data forwarding, and analytics into a single platform.
one_liner: All-in-one marketing measurement for B2C

name: Rankai
long_description:
Marketing agencies are expensive and human-powered. Rankai is building AI agents to replace them. 

Our first AI agent automates the entire SEO process and makes it 20x more affordable.
one_liner: Building AI Agents to replace Marketing Agencies

name: Smobi
long_description: Smobi is an AI powered conversational marketing platform that helps e-commerce brands increase sales and improve their customer relationships via interactive SMS messages.
one_liner: Bringing In-App experiences to SMS

name: Nowadays
long_description: Nowadays is an AI copilot that automates the boring parts of planning corporate events. For example, our AI can contact venues by email and phone to get availability, deal with back-and-forth negotiations, and present the best options.
one_liner: AI co-pilot for corporate event planning

name: Kiosk
long_description:
At Kiosk, we help companies engage with their customers on their preferred app, WhatsApp.

In short, we blend AI agents and traditional marketing tools (Campaigns, Workflows) to generate personalised conversations at scale. Think of us like the MailChimp for WhatsApp, with a conversational AI twist 💬

While WhatsApp is a key revenue driver in markets like India, its vast potential in Europe and Emerging Markets is still largely untapped!
one_liner: WhatsApp Marketing for E-commerce

name: Resonance
long_description: Resonance enables companies to access a set of AI marketing models trained on their proprietary data that they can rapidly deploy within their MarTech stack to optimize use cases such as email subject lines, SMS copy, etc.
one_liner: Deploy finetuned AI models within your existing MarTech stack

name: Yarn
long_description:
Yarn uses AI to help founders, salespeople, and marketers make product and sales videos.

Teams are using Yarn to make sales collateral, launch videos, use-case demos, training guides, and feature updates for Twitter and LinkedIn.

No video experience needed and everything looks great out-of-the-box – think Notion, Linear, or Stripe-quality – but branded for your team.

The magic really comes from AI (TTS, CV, LLMs) – so you can zip through 5x faster than a Loom.
one_liner: Make sales and marketing videos with AI.

name: GetCrux
long_description:
GetCrux is the AI Creative Strategist to launch winning ads.

Creatives have become the biggest lever to win on ad platforms. Yet, there is no clear way to figure out why something works. Marketers end up guessing and replicating the best performing ad, only to see it fail - with high CAC & wasted dollars.

GetCrux helps performance marketers find winning patterns in their ad creatives across 100+ parameters like hooks, messaging, storyline, music, pacing, and recommend exactly what to launch next.
one_liner: AI Creative Strategist

name: Apten
long_description: Apten is an AI SMS agent that automates sales and marketing for consumer services businesses. We help businesses build customized agentic conversation flows to drive higher lead conversion and personalized messaging.
one_liner: Customizable AI SMS agents for businesses

name: stormy.ai
long_description:
Influencer marketing is a pain to set up. Founders spend hours scrolling the feed, DMing content creators, negotiating deals and paying them.

We hated that process. So we fully automated it with AI.

Now, you can focus on building and let Stormy handle the distribution!
one_liner: Influencer marketing on autopilot

name: Remade
long_description: Remade uses AI to scale hyper-personalized video generation for marketplaces. Our first customer, Scentbird, a midmarket fragrance marketplace uses Remade to create engaging TikTok ad hooks. We are a team of 4 Cambridge AI hackers with publications in CVPR, the largest Computer Vision conference, and the Lancet Journal, the most respected medical journal globally. Our ARR grew 83% last week from 18k to 33k with an additional 17k pilot revenue with Rappi and eFood, which will take us to a 650k contracted ARR by EoQ. We are building out a research-arm to develop proprietary tech, fusing recommendation algorithms with video models to deliver hyper-personalised videos that increase conversion.
one_liner: Using AI to hyper-personalize videos for marketplaces

name: Typa - by Weavel
long_description: Typa automates inbound by posting authentic, everyday content crafted by AI. Simply chat with Typa and share your tasks, thoughts, or challenges - and AI generates content that sounds just like you, with your own insights incorporated. Watch your outreach grow on platforms like Twitter, LinkedIn, Bluesky, Medium, and more.
one_liner: Automate inbound through authentic, everyday content posted by AI.

name: Affil.ai
long_description:
We help companies like Capital One work with their affiliate content creators like CNBC more easily. Affiliate is an important growth channel, accounting for 25% of new credit card sign-ups, but today's financial companies use multiple layers of middleman to do their affiliate marketing and adhere to compliance guidelines.  This is costly and time consuming for fintechs and affiliates alike in this massive market. 

Affil leverages AI to automate affiliate compliance, monitoring, and management to wrap the middleman into major player. This not only makes it easier for fintechs to market their products, but it also helps improve the affiliate experience as well.
one_liner: AI Affiliate Network For Financial Companies

name: Luthor
long_description: Luthor is an AI-powered copilot for marketing compliance. We scan all your marketing content in real-time to flag risky language and suggest fixes, ensuring you adhere to regulations from agencies like the FTC, FDA, and SEC. With Luthor, you can manage your marketing efforts confidently, knowing your content remains compliant.
one_liner: AI Copilot for Marketing Compliance

name: Aditto
long_description: Aditto lets you launch and manage AI generated ads and landing pages at scale. Founders and executives use Aditto to do the work of a whole search engine marketing team in minutes.
one_liner: Let AI manage your marketing.
